title: [LFT] Amazing Support! Plz Add.
body:
Really good **Support** Main. (Can play anything)

- S4 - Gold 1 (was 2-2 for Plat Promos T_T)
- **Pre S5 - Plat 4**
- S5 - Gold 3 89LP (have'nt played much atm)

I have teamspeak, skype and raidcall.

Won't be disappointed!

IGN - **La Baguette**

replies.body:
Heya :D Have a ranked team with a bunch of Real life mates but we're missing a support and could use an awesome support. 

Hit me up at my IGN

Cerulean Sky

If interested
